code: export const validatePassword=password=>{if(password.length<6){return"Password needs to be at least 6 characters long";}return"";};export const checkPasswords=(password1,password2)=>{if(password1!==password2){return"Passwords do not match";}return"";};export const validateEmail=email=>{if(!email.match(/^(\D)+(\w)*((\.(\w)+)?)+@(\D)+(\w)*((\.(\D)+(\w)*)+)?(\.)[a-z]{2,}$/)){return"Not a valid Email";}return"";};
